Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement VerdictSec security assessment CLI with MCP server

Complete implementation of a Go security assessment tool with:

CLI Commands \(verdict\):
- scan: Full security scan with all engines
- ci: CI mode with strict policy enforcement
- sast: Static analysis using gosec
- vuln: Vulnerability scanning using govulncheck
- secrets: Secrets detection using gitleaks
- sbom: SBOM generation using cyclonedx-gomod
- baseline write/update: Manage suppressed findings
- policy lint: Validate policy configuration

MCP Server \(verdict-mcp\):
- Tools: verdict_scan, verdict_sast, verdict_vuln, verdict_secrets,
  verdict_baseline_add, verdict_policy_check
- Resources: verdict://config, verdict://baseline, verdict://engines
- Transports: stdio \(default\), http with SSE

Architecture:
- Hexagonal/ports-and-adapters design
- Domain-driven with Finding, Assessment, Policy, Baseline aggregates
- Deterministic fingerprinting for finding deduplication
- Policy evaluation with thresholds and suppressions

Dependencies:
- github.com/spf13/cobra for CLI
- github.com/felixgeelhaar/mcp-go for MCP protocol
- External tools: gosec, govulncheck, gitleaks, cyclonedx-gomod
EOF
\)")
